          <title>
            <string language="sl">Izračunaj sile pri  sprednjih in zadnjih kolesih tovornjaka</string>
            <string language="en">Calculate the normal forces on the front and rear tires of a truck</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Errechnen Sie die normalen Kräfte auf den 
vorderen und hinteren Gummireifen eines LKW</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Calculez les forces normales sur les pneus plan et
arrière d'un camion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Calcule as forças normais nos pneus dianteiros e 
traseiros de um caminhão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Calcoli le forze normali sulle gomme anteriore e 
posteriore di un camion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπολογίστε τις κανονικές δυνάμεις στο μέτωπο και 
εκθρέψτε τις ρόδες ενός truck</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Calcule las fuerzas normales en los 
neumáticos delanteros y posteriores de un carro</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Tovornjak stoji v ravnovesju na cesti.</string>
            <string language="en">The track is in equilibrium state on a road.</string>
          </description>

Straße.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La piste est dans l'état d'équilibre sur une 
route.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A trilha está no estado do equilíbrio em uma 
estrada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La pista è nell'equilibrio dichiara su una
strada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η διαδρομή είναι στο κράτος ισορροπίας σε έναν 
δρόμο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La pista está en estado del equilibrio en un
